entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023
